metadata.dc:description: We report 10 cases of spontaneous perirenal hematoma that had been treated from 1974 to 1992. Retroperitoneal hemorrhage was secondary to renal disease in 7 cases, perirenal in 2 and extrarenal in 1. The etiology of the condition is analyzed in detail and the diagnostic usefulness of the different radiologic examinations are discussed. Making a preoperative diagnosis permits a more adequate surgical strategy.
metadata.dc:title: Hematoma perirrenal espontáneo.
[Spontaneous perirenal hematoma].
